title: Completed PE Summary - Lerrix
raw_html:
Category Merchant
Type: General Cargo Vessel
Date 27/04/05
Location of incident: Off the Danish Coast, on passage from Rotterdam to Aarhus
Incident Type: Grounded

Synopsis
The loaded general cargo vessel Lerrix grounded off the Danish coast, sustaining serious hull damage, while on passage from Rotterdam to Aarhus, Denmark in poor visibility.

Action taken
The Chief Inspector of Marine Accidents has written to the owner of the vessel concerning the following:

  • The importance of completing a proper passage plan for each and every voyage, including laying the track to follow/ course line on the chart.
  • The masters obligations concerning immediately reporting an accident such as a grounding to the coastal state when within territorial waters.
